text: hwla' aladhin tqddamat sftuhm yutawn thawab eamalahum mrtyn: ealaa al'iiman bktabhm, waealaa 'iimanuhum bialquran bima sbru, wamin awsafhm 'anahum yadfaeun alsayiyat balhsnt, wamimaa razaqnahum yunfiqun fi sabil alkhayr walbr. wa'iidha sumie hwla' alqawm albatil min alqawl lm yusghu 'ilyh, wqalu: lana 'aemaluna la nhyd enha, walakum 'aemalukum wwzrha elykm, fnhn la nshghl 'anfusina bialradi elykm, wala tasmaeun mnna 'iilaa alkhyr, wala nkhatbhm bmqtda jhlkm; li'anana la nurid tariq aljahilin wala nhbha. whdha min khayr ma yaquluh aldeat 'iilaa allh
